pages.text: $(li)The Ancient Tome Power can be used to upgrade an enchanted item with Power V enchantment to level VI.$(br)$(li)To apply this enchant, you need to place the desired item and the ancient tome in an Anvil while you have at least 30 levels.
pages.title: A.T. Power VI

pages.text: The Ancient tomes can only be obtained rarely in Loot Chests. Insert a picture of a Straddleboard and Fire Resistance effect
